description: Iranian state media mourn Qasem Soleimani, but anti-government social media users celebrate his death.
title: Defiant Iranians mourn 'martyr' Soleimani
title_page: Defiant Iranians mourn 'martyr' Soleimani - BBC News
maintext: Shahed Alavi, a journalist based abroad, tweeted "Today I'm a Syrian child screaming out the names of all the 500,000 people who died in the Syrian civil war, and after every name I will say: The architect of the bloody crackdown, the architect of the great massacre, has been killed".
